delete.title: Are you sure you want to delete this booking page?
delete.subtitle:
You will not be able to retrieve the event data once deleted.
Events received through this booking page will not be deleted, and they can not be confirmed, rescheduled or canceled.

deactivate.title: Are you sure you want to deactivate this page?
deactivate.subtitle: If you deactivate it, you won't be able to receive events to this booking page.

confirm.title: Are you sure you want to activate this page?
confirm.subtitle: Once enabled, you can receive events to the booking page.

exportModal.title: Export
exportModal.withButtonDescription: Copy the code and paste it into a booking page button.
exportModal.withQRDescription: Copy the booking page as a QR code and paste it onto wherever you want.

confirmModal.Btndescription:
When sending an email, 
 you can paste the code into the HTML editor.
confirmModal.QRDescription: You can also paste images where necessary.
